name: The Mushroom Quest
description:
Hey! Thanks for having interest in our first game. We worked really hard to make it and are proud to finally be able to release it so people can test and enjoy.

Your objective is to find your little mushroon friend, who, obviously, is going to be in the end of the game. There are a few easter eggs and places you can jump to get boosts, so be aware of your surroundings.

Finally, enjoy and let us know where we can improve!

P.S.: More levels are being developed and will be added with time, as well as other functions and easter eggs in the game.
